mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profiles ( profile_no , tree_no , profile_name , birthday , family_relations, address, phone, profile_image , profile_state) VALUES ( seq_profile_no.nextval , #{treeNo} , #{profileName:VARCHAR}, #{birthday:VARCHAR} , #{familyRelations:VARCHAR}, #{address:VARCHAR} ,#{phone:VARCHAR} ,#{profileImage:VARCHAR} ,'1' )
